body_html:
I will run those benchmarks later tonight and get back to you. in terms of flags i used to build, i used the build_raspberry_pi.sh directly, which translated into

bazel build -c opt --copt=-march=armv6 --copt=-mfpu=vfp \
  --copt=-funsafe-math-optimizations --copt=-ftree-vectorize \
  --copt=-fomit-frame-pointer --cpu=armeabi \
  --crosstool_top=@local_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain \
  --verbose_failures \
  //tensorflow/tools/benchmark:benchmark_model \
  //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

body:
I will run those benchmarks later tonight and get back to you. in terms of flags i used to build, i used the `build_raspberry_pi.sh` directly, which translated into

```
bazel build -c opt --copt=-march=armv6 --copt=-mfpu=vfp \
  --copt=-funsafe-math-optimizations --copt=-ftree-vectorize \
  --copt=-fomit-frame-pointer --cpu=armeabi \
  --crosstool_top=@local_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain \
  --verbose_failures \
  //tensorflow/tools/benchmark:benchmark_model \
  //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
